feed.title: Track Awesome Json Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome JSON libraries and resources.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on May 05, 2024
entry.content:
Format Extensions

  • Sequence JSON (⭐139) - A proposal for a standard way of creating music sequence data in JSON.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on May 01, 2024
entry.content:
Applications

  • Visual JSON (⭐302) - simple JSON pretty-viewer for Mac OS X. (inactive)

Format Extensions

  • NDJSON (⭐751) (Newline delimited JSON) - a standard for delimiting JSON in stream protocols.

Transformations

  • deepjson - A better way to load big json config files. (node.js)

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Mar 03, 2024
entry.content:
Command-line tools

  • jq (⭐32k) - A lightweight and flexible command-line JSON processor.
    • jaq (⭐3.2k) - A jq clone focussed on correctness, speed, and simplicity. Written in Rust.
    • gojq (⭐3.5k) - Pure Go implementation of jq. A bit faster and more portable.

Libraries

  • JsonHilo (⭐41) - Minimal lossless parse event streaming, akin to SAX.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Feb 21, 2024
entry.content:
Binary Serialization

  • BSON - Binary JSON.
  • CBOR - Concise Binary Object Representation.

Browser Extensions

  • JSON Formatter (github (⭐4k)) - Makes JSON easy to read. Open source.
  • JSON Viewer (github (⭐3.4k)) - It is a Chrome extension for printing JSON and JSONP.
  • JSON Finder (github (⭐40)) - Browse like you do it in Finder.
  • JSON Viewer Pro (github (⭐566) - An open source Chrome extension for browsing JSON with syntax highlighting and folding, or as a visual graph.
  • Discoverable JSON (github (⭐3)) - Gron inspired Extension. Convert a JSON document into javascript expressions. Comes with filter, remove, find-and-replace capabilities.

Command-line tools

  • jshon - A parser designed for maximum convenience within the shell.

Differencing

  • JSONPatch - A format for describing changes to a document.

Editors

  • JSON Crack - Display your JSON as a graph

Format Extensions

  • survey.js - JSON based survey library.
  • JackSON: JSON secret keeper (⭐19) - JSONic way of storing secrets in config file.

Libraries

  • Jansson (⭐3.2k) - A C library for encoding, decoding and manipulating data.
  • oboe.js (⭐4.8k) - A streaming approach, speeds up web applications by providing parsed objects before the response completes.

Online tools

  • JSON Editor online - A web-based tool to view, edit and format.
  • JSON Generator - Tool for generating random data.
  • CSV to JSON - Easy, privacy-friendly and offline-first online csv to json converter
  • geojson.io - Simply edit GeoJSON map data.
  • ObjGen - Online live JSON generator.

Schema Specifications

  • JSON Schema - a JSON based format for defining the structure of JSON data.
  • Kwalify (⭐22) - A parser, schema validator, and data binding tool
  • Rx - Simple, Extensible Schemata.

Services

  • Telize - JSON IP and GeoIP REST API.

Tutorials

  • JSON - Rosetta Code - Basic operations in different languages (57 languages in this moment).

Transformations

  • nimnjs (⭐46) - JSON to nimn bidirectional converter.

Queries

  • dasel (⭐7.5k) - Query and update data structures using selectors from the command line. Comparable to jq (⭐32k) / yq (⭐2.8k) but supports JSON, YAML, TOML and XML with zero runtime dependencies.
  • ObjectPath - The agile query language for semi-structured data. (Python)

JSON Schema Resources

  • JSON Schema Store - A collection of popular schemas.
  • Awesome JSON Schema (⭐146) - A curated list of awesome JSON Schema resources, tutorials, tools, and more.

JSON Schema Validators

  • jsonschema (⭐4.8k) - Python implementation of jsonschema.
  • Ruby JSON Schema Validator (⭐1.6k) - validating against a JSON schema conforming to JSON Schema Draft 4.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Feb 08, 2024
entry.content:
Command-line tools

  • logdy (⭐1.8k) - jq, tail, less, grep and awk merged together and available in a clean web UI.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Oct 03, 2023
entry.content:
Command-line tools

  • livejq (⭐16) - An alternative jq implementation in rust for continuous parsing without crashing on invalid JSON

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Sep 22, 2023
entry.content:
Command-line tools

  • json-search (⭐4) - A small tool to search for objects/values in json files.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Feb 23, 2023
entry.content:
Command-line tools

  • jc (⭐8.3k) - Converts the output of many CLI tools, file-types, and common strings into JSON

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Oct 12, 2022
entry.content:
Applications

  • Dadroit JSON Viewer - Very fast JSON Viewer, supporting huge (multi gigabytes) files, JSON log (JSON-Lines and ndjson).

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Sep 18, 2022
entry.content:
Frontend components

  • @textea/json-viewer (⭐503) - A React component for JSON viewer. (React)

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Feb 22, 2022
entry.content:
Binary Serialization

  • JSON BinPack - Space-efficient binary JSON serialization format based on JSON Schema.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Jan 30, 2022
entry.content:
Libraries

  • json-build (⭐41) - A minimalistic serializer in C. It can be easily integrated into the resource-limited projects or embedded systems.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Jan 15, 2022
entry.content:
Command-line tools

  • dsq (⭐3.8k) - Tool for running SQL queries against JSON, CSV, Excel, Parquet, and more.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Aug 11, 2021
entry.content:
Libraries

  • FracturedJsonJs - A JSON formatter that produces human-readable but fairly compact output.
  • FracturedJson - A formatter that produces human-readable but fairly compact output.

Online tools

  • FracturedJson - Formatter that produces human-readable but fairly compact output.

Text Editor Plugins

  • FracturedJsonVsc - Formatter that produces human-readable but fairly compact output.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Jul 16, 2021
entry.content:
Libraries

  • jshn - JSON parsing and generation library in for shell scripts (Ash/Bash)

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on May 16, 2021
entry.content:
Text Editor Plugins

  • nvim-jqx (⭐323) - Browse and query json files in neovim from the quickfix window. (Lua)

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Apr 13, 2021
entry.content:
Binary Serialization

  • UBJSON - The universally compatible format specification for binary JSON.

Browser Extensions

  • JSONAce (github (⭐71)) - Formats & syntax highlights JSON viewed inside of the web browser using the ACE editor.
  • JSONView (github (⭐293)) - A port of the JSONView Firefox extension that formats and syntax highlights JSON viewed inside of the browser

Databases

  • CouchDB - Seamless multi-master sync, that scales from Big Data to Mobile, with an Intuitive HTTP/JSON API and designed for Reliability.

Datasets

  • getCountries() - Generator for custom Countries data.

Data modeling

  • JSONModel (⭐6.8k) - Magical Data Modelling Framework. (Objective-C)

Format Extensions

  • hal-json - A set of conventions for expressing hyperlinks in either JSON or XML.
  • JSON Activity Streams - A format for syndicating social activities around the web.

Frontend components

  • Dynatable.js (⭐2.8k) - A funner, semantic, HTML5+JSON, interactive table plugin. (jQuery)

Libraries

  • SBJson (⭐3.7k) - Parse one or more chunks of data.
  • jsonapi-consumer (⭐7) - Client framework for consuming JSONAPI based APIs on the JSON API standard.

Online tools

  • json2csharp - Generate c# classes from a json string or url.

Schema Specifications

  • Itemscript - Language for validating and specifying values.

Supersets

  • ASON (⭐2) - A semantically complete superset of JSON (draft).

Tutorials

  • jq Primer: Munging JSON Data - How jq can be used to process JSON files just as effectively as traditional Unix tools.

Related formats

  • AXON (⭐23) - A simple text based format for interchanging of objects, documents and data. It tries to combine the best of JSON, XML and YAML.

Transformations

  • SassyJSON (⭐169) - Sass-powered API. (Sass)

Queries

  • JMESPath - A query language for JSON.
  • JSONiq - The JSON Query Language.
  • JSONata - Query and transformation language used in Node-RED, supports function expressions.

JSON Schema Validators

  • ajv (⭐14k) - The fastest validator. Supports v5/6 proposals.

Transformations

  • stylops (⭐0) - CSS subset to JSON conversion. (node.js)

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Jun 23, 2020
entry.content:
Command-line tools

  • oj (⭐903) - A fast and flexible command line JSON processor.

Format Extensions

  • JSON 1.1/JSONX - An evolved version 1.1 with format extension for humans incl. comments, unquoted and multi-line strings, optional and trailing commas and more.

Libraries

  • ojc (⭐34) - A fast JSON parser.
  • ojg (⭐903) - A collection of high performance JSON processing and generating tool.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Dec 29, 2019
entry.content:
Libraries

  • essential-json (⭐22) - A lightweight Java library for serialization, parsing and manipulation with a clean and precise API.
  • dsl-json (⭐1k) - A very fast streaming JSON library. Operates on byte arrays.
  • mjson (⭐88) - Lean JSON Library for Java, with a compact, elegant API.

Testing

  • JSON Parsing Test Suite (⭐1k) - A very complete test suite and validation framework.

Online tools

Online tools

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on May 09, 2019
entry.content:
Databases

Datasets

  • MTG JSON - Up to date Magic the Gathering card data.

Format Extensions

  • GeoJSON - A geospatial data interchange format.

Supersets

  • YAML - A human friendly data serialization standard for all programming languages.

Transformations

  • x2js (⭐1k) - XML to JSON and vice versa javascript conversion functions. (Javascript)

Queries

  • DefiantJS - Lightning-fast searches using XPath expressions, and transform using XSL. (Javascript)

JSON Schema Validators

  • JSON Guard - A validator for JSON Schema Draft 4.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Jul 01, 2018
entry.content:
Format Extensions

  • JSON-RPC - A stateless, light-weight remote procedure call (RPC) protocol.
  • JSON5 - a extension that aims to make it easier for humans to write and maintain by hand.
  • JSON Meta Application Protocol (JMAP) - A protocol for synchronising JSON-based data objects efficiently, with support for push and out-of-band binary data upload/download.

Templates

  • Jsonnet - A domain specific configuration language that helps you define JSON data.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Apr 23, 2018
entry.content:
Online tools

  • Extends Class - Diff tool to compare two files.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Mar 04, 2018
entry.content:
Binary Serialization

  • MessagePack - An extremely efficient object serialization library.

Datasets

  • country.io - Various country related datasets, as JSON inc currency, country codes, names and more

Format Extensions

  • JSONP - Safer cross-domain Ajax with JSON-P/JSONP.

Libraries

  • jsmn - A minimalistic parser in C. It can be easily integrated into the resource-limited projects or embedded systems.
  • RapidJSON (⭐15k) - A fast JSON parser/generator for C++ with both SAX/DOM style API
  • Jackson (⭐9.4k) - A multi-purpose Java library for processing JSON data format.
  • JSON 3 - A modern implementation.

Supersets

  • HOCON (⭐6.2k) - Human-Optimized Config Object Notation.

Tutorials

  • JSON Tutorial - An introductory tutorial on JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).

Resources

  • Type-o-rama (⭐245) - JS type systems interportability, comparison of different JS type systems and conversion between them.

Transformations

  • fast-xml-parser (⭐2.8k) - Fast XML to JSON and vice versa javascript/JSON conversion.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Feb 22, 2018
entry.content:

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Jan 21, 2018

entry.content:
JSON Schema Tools

  • aptos (⭐149) - A tool for validating data using JSON Schema and converting JSON Schema documents into different data-interchange formats.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Jul 18, 2017
entry.content:
Databases

  • Lawnchair (⭐2.1k) - A lightweight clientside document store. (Javascript)
  • RxDB (⭐22k) - Event-driven JSON-Database with JSON-Schema, mango-Query and CouchDB-sync. (Javascript)

Format Extensions

  • JSON-LD - A lightweight Linked Data format.
  • JSON6 (⭐238) - JSON for Humans (ES6).

Libraries

  • scala-jsonapi (⭐106) - Support library for integrating the JSON:API spec with Play, Spray and/or Circe backends.

Online tools

  • JSONLint - The JSON Validator.
  • JSONCompare - The Advanced Version of the JSON Linter.

Services

  • JSONProxy (⭐304) - Simple HTTP proxy that enables cross-domain requests to any JSON API.

Transformations

  • JSON-populate (⭐159) - Tool for populating JSON data with infinitely recursive circular references. Sort of like Falcor, but for plain JSON.
  • CircularJSON (⭐608) - JSON does not handle circular references. Now it does.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Jun 30, 2017
entry.content:
Command-line tools

  • jiq (⭐933) - It's jid with jq. You can drill down interactively by using jq filtering queries.
  • jv (⭐120) - jv (for jsonviewer) helps you view your JSON.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on May 04, 2017

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Feb 24, 2017

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Feb 21, 2017
entry.content:
Command-line tools

  • jid (⭐7k) - Incremental Digger. Drill down JSON interactively by using filtering queries like jq.

Databases

  • JSONlite (⭐845) - A simple, self-contained, serverless, zero-configuration, json document store. (Bash)

Libraries

  • aeson-qq (⭐80) - JSON quasiquoter for Haskell.
  • json2react (⭐171) - Use JSON to create React Stateless Components.

Online tools

  • JSON.fr - Fully client-side validator and formatter.

Transformations

  • normalizr (⭐21k) - Normalizes nested JSON according to a schema. (Javascript)

  • json2json (⭐191) - Transform (reformat) structures from one to another. (Javascript)

Queries

  • searchjs (⭐312) - A library for filtering based on a json SQL-like language.

JSON Schema Tools

  • prmd (⭐2.1k) - Tools and doc generation for HTTP APIs.
  • jsonschema2pojo (⭐6.3k) - Generates Java types and annotates those types for data-binding with Jackson 1.x or 2.x, Gson, etc.
  • Matic (⭐180) - Build tool for generating HTML documentation.

entry.title: Awesome Json Updates on Mar 28, 2015
entry.content:
Browser Extensions

  • JSONView (github (⭐1.6k)) - View JSON documents in the browser.

Datasets

  • countries (⭐6.1k) - World countries.

Differencing

  • JSON-Patch (⭐1.9k) - Lean and mean Javascript implementation of the JSON-Patch standard (RFC 6902). (Javascript)
  • jiff (⭐637) - JSON Patch and diff based on rfc6902. (Javascript)
  • json-patch-php (⭐112) - implementation of JSON-patch (IETF RFC 6902) (PHP)

Format Extensions

  • JsonML - A compact format for transporting XML-based markup as JSON which allows it to be losslessly converted back to its original form.
  • Collection+JSON - A read/write hypermedia-type designed to support management and querying of simple collections.

Frontend components

  • JSON editor jQuery plugin (⭐568) - component for you web apps/pages. (jQuery)
  • jqTree - Widget for displaying a tree structure in html. (jQuery)

Libraries

  • ArduinoJson (⭐7k) - An efficient library for embedded systems.
  • JSON++ (⭐42) - A self contained Flex/Bison parser for C++11.
  • json11 (⭐2.6k) - A tiny library for C++11.
  • data.json - parser/generator to/from Clojure data structures.
  • Fast JSON Processor (⭐26k)
  • JSON-js (⭐8.7k) - JSON in JavaScript.
  • Webmozart JSON (⭐355) - A robust decoder/encoder with support for schema validation.
  • simplejson (⭐1.7k) - A simple, fast, extensible encoder/decoder
  • jsonpickle - Library for serializing any arbitrary object graph.
  • oj (⭐3.2k) - A fast JSON parser and Object marshaller as a Ruby gem.
  • jsonfx (⭐378) - serialization framework for .NET.
  • spray-json (⭐972) - A lightweight, clean and simple implementation in Scala.
  • SwiftyJSON (⭐23k) - The better way to deal with data in Swift.

Linters

  • jsonlint (⭐2k) - Parser and validator with a CLI. (Javascript)

Online tools

  • JSON Utils - Site for generating C#, VB.Net, and Javascript classes from JSON.
  • jq play - A playground for jq.

Tutorials

  • Introducing JSON

Templates

  • rabl (⭐3.6k) - General ruby templating with json, bson, xml, plist and msgpack support. (Ruby)
  • json2html - HTML templating library with wrappers for both jQuery and Node.js. (Javascript)

Testing

  • JSON Test - Testing platform for services utilizing JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).
  • JSONassert (⭐1k) - Write JSON unit tests in less code. Great for testing REST interfaces. (Java)
  • JsonUnit (⭐936) - A library that simplifies JSON comparison in unit tests. It's strongly inspired by XmlUnit.

Text Editor Plugins

  • vim-json (⭐1.2k) - A better JSON for Vim: distinct highlighting of keywords vs values, JSON-specific (non-JS) warnings, quote concealing. Pathogen-friendly.

Transformations

  • trans (⭐178) - The ultimate object transformer. (Javascript)
  • osmtogeojson (⭐728) - Converts OSM data to GeoJSON. (Javascript)
  • JSONC (⭐648) - JSON compressor and decompressor. (Javascript)
  • json.human.js - A small library to convert a JSON object into a human readable HTML representation that is easy to style for different purposes.
  • JSONtoFoundation - OS X utility that converts a JSON object to a Foundation object that can be used in Cocoa/Cocoa Touch development. (Swift)

Queries

  • JSON Mask (⭐868) - Tiny language and engine for selecting specific parts of a JS object, hiding the rest. (Javascript)

JSON Schema Tools

  • generate-schema (⭐1.1k) - Effortlessly convert your JSON Object to JSON Schema, Mongoose Schema, or a Generic template for quick documentation / upstart.

JSON Schema Validators

  • json-schema-benchmark (⭐387) - Performance benchmark for Node.js validators.
  • is-my-json-valid (⭐968) - A validator that uses code generation to be extremely fast.
  • jsen (⭐154) - A validator built for speed.
  • themis (⭐60) - A blazing fast validator.
  • jsck (⭐158) - JSON Schema Compiled checK.
  • z-schema (⭐339) - validator written in JavaScript for NodeJS and Browsers.
  • jjv (⭐199) - Javascript Library for Schema Validation.
  • request-validator (⭐0) - Flexible request validator middleware for express and connect.
  • tv4 (⭐1.2k) - Tiny Validator.
  • JSON Schema for PHP (⭐3.6k) - PHP implementation of JSON schema.
